data.alt: How to Prepare for Jobs that Don't Exist - Sidu Ponnappa
data.heading: How to Prepare for Jobs that Don't Exist - Sidu Ponnappa
data.text: The future is getting stranger and reality is a harsh mistress. The extent of automation and reduced human intervention in creating software underscores the need for today's programmers to continuously learn, read and hone their craft. Watch the video for more

data.alt: Gojek x Google Next 2018 - Ajey Gore
data.heading: Gojek x Google Next 2018 - Ajey Gore
data.text: Despite the disability Mr. Sumani has, he is still consistent in helping other people. Let us learn from Mr. Sumani that no matter what our weakness may be, we should always be willing to  contribute to our surroundings..

data.alt: Tech in Asia Singapore 2018 'How to Experiment with Product Improvements' - Crystal Widjaja
data.heading: Tech in Asia Singapore 2018 'How to Experiment with Product Improvements' - Crystal Widjaja
data.text: Debuting on stage with a scooter in Google Cloud Next '18, Ajey (our CTO) shared how Gojek scaled its impact with the help of Google technology. Ajey shared how Google Maps enabled our driver partners to pick up customers accurately and provide accurate estimates of food delivery times.

data.heading: Tech Challenges at Gojek
data.text: At Gojek, the breadth of technologies as well as the (rapidly growing) volume of data makes every single day challenging. If youâ€™re passionate about technology and are looking for something unpredictable and challenging, Gojek is THE place for you.

data.heading: CODE AT SCALE - Shobhit Srivastava
data.text: #CODEATSCALE - Watch how Shobhit, our Product Engineer, takes us through his journey into changing people's lives at Gojek.

data.heading: DESIGN AT SCALE - Fatema Raja
data.text: #DESIGNATSCALE - At Gojek, design is used to drive impact at scale. With over 100 million downloads and over 100 million monthly orders, the app depends on design-thinking to continue evolving. See how Fatema, our Product Designer, discovered this as she joined the company.
